001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
004
005import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
006import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
007import java.lang.annotation.Target;
008
009import com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode;
010
011public enum Alliance {
012    RED(Color.RED),
013    BLUE(Color.BLUE),
014    NONE(Color.BLACK);
015    Color color;
016
017    Alliance(Color c) {
018        color = c;
019    }
020
021    public Color getColor() {
022        return color;
023    }
024
025    public <T> T selectOf(T a, T b) {
026        return Selector.selectOf(this, a, b);
027    }
028
029    public static class Selector<T> {
030        private final T r, b;
031
032        protected Selector(T red, T blue) {
033            r = red;
034            b = blue;
035        }
036
037        public T select(Alliance a) {
038            return a == RED ? r : b;
039        }
040
041        public static <T> Selector<T> of(T red, T blue) {
042            return new Selector<>(red, blue);
043        }
044
045        public static <T> T selectOf(Alliance alliance, T red, T blue) {
046            return Selector.of(red, blue).select(alliance);
047        }
048    }
049
050    public static Alliance get(Class<? extends OpMode> c) {
051        if (c.isAnnotationPresent(Red.class)) return RED;
052        if (c.isAnnotationPresent(Blue.class)) return BLUE;
053        return NONE;
054    }
055
056    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
057    @Target(TYPE)
058    public @interface Red {}
059
060    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
061    @Target(TYPE)
062    public @interface Blue {}
063}
